list.name: tree closed
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,tree FROM "six_month"."treestatus" WHERE "tree" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'closed' AND $timeFilter

list.name: tree open
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,tree FROM "six_month"."treestatus" WHERE "tree" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'open' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("completed") AS "completed" FROM "one_week"./tc_queue/,"six_month"./tc_queue/ WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(none)

panels.description: See <https://hg.mozilla.org/ci/ci-configuration/file/tip/worker-pools.yml> for setting scaling pool configuration.

targets.query: SELECT (0 + LAST("pendingTasks")) AS "queue", LAST("running") AS "active",  (LAST("pendingTasks") / LAST("active")) AS "lazy", LAST("quarantined") AS "quarantined", LAST("quarantined") / LAST("workers") AS "percent quarantined", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("completed") AS "success", 1.0 - mean("completed") / (mean("exception") + mean("failed") + mean("completed")) as "percent failed" FROM "one_week"."tc_queue2_exec","six_month"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'aws-provisioner-v1' OR "provisionerId" =~ /^gecko/  OR "provisionerId" =~ /^scriptworker-prov/) AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY provisionerId, workerType

SELECT (0 + LAST("pendingTasks")) AS "queue", LAST("running") AS "active",  (LAST("pendingTasks") / LAST("active")) AS "lazy", LAST("quarantined") AS "quarantined", LAST("quarantined") / LAST("workers") AS "percent quarantined", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("completed") AS "success", 1.0 - mean("completed") / (mean("exception") + mean("failed") + mean("completed")) as "percent failed" FROM "one_week"."tc_queue_exec","six_month"."tc_queue_exec" WHERE ( "provisionerId" = 'scriptworker-k8s' OR "provisionerId" = 'gce') AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY provisionerId, workerType

panels.title: Cloud

panels.description:
= Queued tasks / workers running tasks
filtered to:
releng-hardware
aws-provisioner-v1 with /^(mobile|app-services|gecko)-/
terraform-packet

targets.query: SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month./tc_queue2/ WHERE $timeFilter AND "workerType" != '' AND "provisionerId" != 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "provisionerId" != 'gce' AND ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND "workerType" !~ /-(beta|staging|macstadium)$/ GROUP BY time(15m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("provisionerId" = 'terraform-packet' OR "provisionerId" = 'bitbar') AND "workerType" != '' AND ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND "workerType" != '' AND ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND "provisionerId" = 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "workerType" =~ /^(mobile|app-services|gecko)-.*/ GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND "provisionerId" != 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "provisionerId" != 'gce' AND "workerType" != '' AND "workerType" !~ /-(beta|staging|macstadium)$/ GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND "provisionerId" = 'terraform-packet' AND "workerType" != '' GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND "provisionerId" = 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "workerType" =~ /^gecko-.*/ GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") / (mean("running")) as "runner load" FROM six_month."tc_queue_exec" WHERE $timeFilter AND "provisionerId" = 'proj-autophone' AND "workerType" != '' AND ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) GROUP BY time(20m), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(1)

panels.title: TC Worker Backlog/Workers

targets.query: SELECT max("runningCapacity") AS "workers", max("requestedCapacity") AS "requested", max("pendingCapacity") AS "pending", max("maxCapacity") AS "max" FROM "aws-provisionerhttp" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("running") AS "active", (mean("workers") - mean("quarantined")) AS "workers", mean("quarantined") AS "quarantined" FROM "one_week"./tc_queue/,"six_month"./tc_queue/ WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" != 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "provisionerId" !~ /^gecko/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "provisionerId", "workerType" fill(none)

SELECT mean("runningWorkers") AS "active" FROM "one_week"."tc_web_exec","six_month"."tc_web_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" != 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(none)

SELECT max("runningWorkers") AS "max_active" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(none)

SELECT (0 + LAST("pendingTasks")) AS "queue", LAST("running") AS "active", LAST("idle") AS "idle", LAST("workers") AS "workers",  (LAST("pendingTasks") / LAST("workers")) * (MEAN("idle") / LAST("workers")) AS "lazy", LAST("quarantined") AS "quarantined", LAST("quarantined") / LAST("workers") AS "percent quarantined", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("completed") AS "success", 1.0 - mean("completed") / (mean("exception") + mean("failed") + mean("completed")) as "percent failed" FROM "one_week"."tc_queue2_exec","six_month"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "provisionerId" != 'aws-provisioner-v1' AND "provisionerId" != 'gce' AND "provisionerId" !~ /^gecko/ AND "provisionerId" !~ /^scriptworker/ AND "provisionerId" !~ /^bitbar/ AND "provisionerId" != 'proj-autophone' AND "provisionerId" != 'terraform-packet' AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY provisionerId, workerType

SELECT (0 + LAST("pendingTasks")) AS "queue", LAST("running") AS "active", LAST("idle") AS "idle", LAST("workers") AS "workers",  (LAST("pendingTasks") / LAST("workers")) * (MEAN("idle") / LAST("workers")) AS "lazy", LAST("quarantined") AS "quarantined", LAST("quarantined") / LAST("workers") AS "percent quarantined", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("completed") AS "success", 1.0 - mean("completed") / (mean("exception") + mean("failed") + mean("completed")) as "percent failed" FROM /tc_queue_/ WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'bitbar') AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY provisionerId, workerType

SELECT last("runningWorkers") AS "active", last("workers") AS "workers", last("pendingTasks") AS "queue", last("idleWorkers") AS "idle" FROM "six_month"."tc_web_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND ("provisionerId" = 'bitbar' OR "provisionerId" = 'proj-autophone' OR "provisionerId" = 'terraform-packet')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "provisionerId", "workerType"

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM /^tc_queue/ WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(none)
SELECT mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM /^tc_queue_exec/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType", "provisionerId" fill(none)

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM six_month./tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "provisionerId"
list.name: provisioner
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM six_month./tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "provisionerId"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM six_month./tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.name: workerType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM six_month./tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
